articles.description: Online transaction data of around 10 crore Indians have been breached in one of the biggest data leaks in the recent past and is on sale on the dark web, according to a report by Business Standard. The data has been allegedly lifted from Bengaluru-based finte…

articles.author: Aditya Nadkarni
articles.title: Nissan Magnite receives 32,800 bookings; company starts third shift to cater to the demand - CarWale
articles.description: The Nissan Magnite recently achieved a four-star ASEAN NCAP crash test result. The company is increasing the production capacity of the model to reduce the waiting period.
